faq.question: What types of tasks can be automated?
faq.answer: Almost anything repetitive! Common examples include data entry, email management, report generation, social media posting, customer onboarding, invoice processing, and CRM updates.

faq.question: Will automation replace my employees?
faq.answer: No, automation eliminates tedious tasks so your team can focus on strategic, creative, and high-value work. It's about augmenting your workforce, not replacing it.

faq.question: How long does it take to see ROI?
faq.answer: Most clients see positive ROI within 2-4 months. Time savings are immediate, and efficiency gains compound over time as your team adopts automated workflows.

faq.question: Can you integrate with our existing tools?
faq.answer: Yes! We work with a wide range of popular tools including Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, Shopify, QuickBooks, and virtually any platform with an API.

faq.question: What if something breaks?
faq.answer: We build robust error handling and monitoring into all workflows. Plus, our support packages include proactive monitoring and quick fixes to keep your automation running smoothly.
